summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 57th Avenue South, from a point 100 feet south of Bangor Street to Ryan Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 12049 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
